alejandrofan2.burgerRun.window

Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • alejandrofan2.burgerRun.window.GamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePanel
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This does the magic, collects all the components and creates the scene of the game. In addition, it also takes care of the fluidity, loading the levels, the music ...
    Author:
    alejandrofan2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
